description: This file defines the BankAccountMapper class, which converts between BankAccount DTOs and BankAccountEntity objects using Spring's BeanUtils for property copying.

classes.name: BankAccountMapper
classes.description: A mapper class for converting between BankAccount DTOs and entity objects, extending BaseMapper.

methods.name: convertToEntity
methods.description: Converts a BankAccount DTO to a BankAccountEntity, copying properties excluding 'user'.

methods.name: convertToDto
methods.description: Converts a BankAccountEntity to a BankAccount DTO, copying properties excluding 'user'.
